地中海マルタ島への輸送作戦\nを実施する！これを阻止せん\nとする敵艦隊を撃破し: Conduct a transport operation to Malta in the Mediterranean Sea! Defeat the enemy fleet to stop them and complete the transport operation!
北方友軍への輸送作戦を実施\nする！敵基地航空及び艦隊に\nよる妨害が予想される: Carry out transport operations to allies in the north! Enemy hindrance is expected to occur. Break through the blocking fleet with elite forces!
北極海航路の大規模輸送船団\nを我が欧州派遣艦隊の総力で\n護衛し、同輸送作戦を: Escort a large convoy of ships in the Arctic Ocean with the full force of our European Fleet to ensure the success of the transport operation! Escort fleet, weigh anchor!
敵編隊接近中！対空戦闘用意ッ！:
Enemy formation approaching!
Prepare for air combat!
接近中の敵艦隊を発見！\n 砲戦、魚雷戦……用意ッ！:
Approaching enemy fleet spotted!
Guns and torpedoes... Ready!
